name: Hotel Kamadhenu
description: Hotel Kamadhenu is an exclusive luxury hotel in the temple town, Basara. This is a well-known hotel in Basara for its warm hospitality and lavish services. The hotel has spacious neat and clean guest rooms with modern day conveniences for its discerning clienteles. In snappy terms, Hotel Kamadhenu is a perfect place to stay for travelers seeking utmost comfort and privacy on a visit to Basar. Hotel Kamadhenu is located right opposite to Sri. Gnana Saraswati Temple. It is just few meters walk to reach temple. Hotel Kamadhenu is only hotel in the entire Basara town-- with elevator facility. Elevator is operated round the clock, especially for the convenience of old-age people.
address: Opp: Sri Gnana Saraswathi Temple,, Adilabad 504101 India

name: Punnami Basara
description:
If you’re looking for a budget friendly hotel in Adilabad, look no further than Punnami Basara.
As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer air conditioning.
Guests have access to room service while staying at Punnami Basara. In addition, Punnami Basara offers an on-site restaurant, which will help make your Adilabad trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.
During your visit, be sure to check out Basar Saraswati Temple (0.0 mi), which is a popular attraction within walking distance of the hotel.
The staff at Punnami Basara looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.
address: Adilabad India

roomTips.text: first floor rooms have balconies and sit outside.
Never eat food at Punnami ( Haritha ) hotel in Basara.

name: Hotel Ravi Teja
description: Hotel Ravi Teja is located at heart of city Adilabad, from here you can reach any part of town within 10 minutes. it is very near to Bus Stand, Main Business Center. We are also having a restaurant and service to the room. Our Hotel Ravi Teja also equipped with two halls with 250 PAX and 100 PAX, which is suitable for all events from personal such as birthdays, get together etc to business meetings. Total we have 29 rooms with 3 Suite Rooms, 5 AC Delux Rooms, 3 Triple AC Rooms,10 AC standard Rooms, 5 Non AC Rooms.
